priorVersion.title: CDISC SEND Body Weight Gain Test Name Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C89959

self.title: CDISC SEND Body Weight Gain Test Name Terminology

definition: Terminology for the test names concerned with the increase in overall body mass.
name: Body Weight Gain Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC SEND Body Weight Gain Test Name Terminology

terms.definition: The mean value of the amount of weight change over a period of time, relative to the beginning of the collection period.
A change in overall body weight, relative to the beginning of the collection period.

The amount of maternal body weight gained over a period of time where the weight at the end of the interval is adjusted for the gravid uterus weight. This is derived by subtracting the maternal body weight adjusted for the gravid uterus from the total maternal body weight.
terms.preferredTerm: Gravid Uterus Adjusted Maternal Body Weight Gain
terms.submissionValue: Gravid Uterus Adjusted Body Weight Gain
synonyms: Gravid Uterus Adjusted Body Weight Gain

terms.definition: The amount of weight change over a period of time in relation to the total weight, relative to the beginning of the collection period.
